ai-tha-ap525:1.1_0: “Open the boat which washed by the ship,
ai-tha-ap525:1.3_0: or being because of their foe.
ai-tha-ap525:2.2_0: whatever I have gone for refuge
ai-tha-ap525:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap525:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap525:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Saṅgāmajī.
ai-tha-ap525:7.1_0: the third (direction) for the Elder to get the third,
